definition[0]: someone who had your job before you started doing it
example[0]: Kennedy’s predecessor as president was the war hero Dwight Eisenhower.
definition[1]: a machine, system etc that existed before another one in a process of development
example[1]: The new BMW has a more powerful engine than its predecessor.
definition[2]: a person who was in a particular post or job before the person who is doing it now
example[2]: Problems he inherited from his predecessor led to the bank’s later troubles.
definition[3]: a machine, system, etc that existed before another one that has developed from it
example[3]: The new car will have a more aerodynamic shape than its popular predecessor.
